|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8997; |rad1oui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MADE IN CHINA", "MODEL:CONAN-MAIN" and "REV:1.0" :are silkscreened on main board.
{{See also|Chromebook|Rockchip|Marvell}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3399 (OP1) :Dual Core (Cortex-A72) @2.0GHz + :Quad Core (Cortex-A53) @1.5GHz *GPU: ''Mali-T860'' MP4 @800MHz :(OpenGL ES3.1, OpenVG1.1, OpenCL, DX11, AFBC) :VPU (w/ 4K VP9, 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 32GB (eMMC) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR3) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Marvell]] 88W8997 :802.11abgn/ac (2T2R), BT 5.1, NFC *USB: 2x USB 3.1 (Type-C) ports *Power Source: 15V 2A via USB Type-C or :Li-Poly battery (7.6V, 5140mAh, 39Wh)
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.theverge.com/2017/2/10/14570480/samsung-chromebook-plus-laptop-review ''Samsung Chromebook Plus review: future imperfect'' on '''The Verge'''] *[https://www.androidguys.com/reviews/accessory-reviews/samsung-chromebook-plus-the-future-of-chromebooks-is-now-review/ ''Samsung Chromebook Plus: The future of Chromebooks is now'' on '''Android Guys'''] *[https://www.pcmag.com/reviews/samsung-chromebook-plus ''Samsung Chromebook Plus Review'' on '''PCMag''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Samsung Chromebox Plus (XE513C24) Top.jpeg|Board top File:Samsung Chromebox Plus (XE513C24) Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom File:Samsung Chromebox Plus (XE513C24) Internal.jpeg|Internal view File:Samsung Chromebox Plus (XE513C24) Battery.jpeg|Internal w/ Battery view </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== *[[Samsung Galaxy Chromebook 2 (XE530QDA)]] (QLED) • 13,3" (1920x1080) :CPU: [[Intel Celeron]] 5205U, 4GB RAM, 64GB Flash • XE530QDA-KA2US :or [[Intel Core]] i3-10110U, 8GB RAM, 128GB Flash • XE530QDA-KA1US :or [[Intel Core]] i5-10310U, 16GB RAM, 256GB Flash • XE530QDA-KA3US :Wi-Fi: 802.11ax, BT 5.0; USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports
